summary: The diff updates global CSS theme variables in frontend/src/index.css to shift secondary/accent and related tokens to a blue hue (supporting REQ-1/REQ-2), but it also modifies the Internet Identity hook despite an explicit constraint not to change it. An extra project_state.json file was added that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not modify the Internet Identity hooks or other files listed under `frontend.immutablePaths`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows modifications to the Internet Identity hook file, which violates the stated constraint (even though this is a branding-only update).

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to Internet Identity hook implementation (authentication-related code edits).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids modifying Internet Identity hooks; branding-only update should not touch auth logic.
Not requested by the BuildRequest and unrelated to the branding-only color theme update.
